description: General schema for financial or insurance claims.

fields.name: claim_id
fields.description: Unique identifier of the claim if present.

fields.name: claimant_name
fields.description: Name of the person or entity submitting the claim.

fields.name: claimant_contact
fields.description: Email, phone, or address for the claimant.

fields.name: claim_type
fields.description: Type of claim (e.g., bank_dispute, insurance, chargeback).

fields.name: claim_date
fields.description: Date the claim was created or submitted.

fields.name: incident_date
fields.description: Date of the incident or transaction being claimed.

fields.name: account_identifier
fields.description: Account number, policy number, or reference identifier.

fields.name: currency
fields.description: Currency code for the claimed amount (e.g., USD, EUR).

fields.name: counterparty
fields.description: Merchant, bank, or other party involved in the claim.

fields.name: claim_reason
fields.description: Short description of why the claim is being raised.

fields.name: claim_details
fields.description: Free-form narrative describing the situation in detail.

fields.name: supporting_documents
fields.description: List of referenced attachments or evidence if explicitly mentioned.

fields.name: resolution_requested
fields.description: What the claimant is asking for (refund, reversal, investigation, etc.).
